text: The Lutheran Council of Great Britain is a Lutheran organization in Great Britain. It is a member of the Lutheran World Federation, by which it was recognized in 1989. It is affiliated with the Anglican-Lutheran Society, Churches Together in Britain and Ireland, Churches Together in England, and the International Ecumenical Fellowship. == External links == *Official website Category:Lutheran organizations Category:Lutheran World Federation members Category:Lutheranism in the United Kingdom Category:Organisations based in the London Borough of Camden Category:Religion in the London Borough of Camden
title: The Lutheran Council of Great Britain
